attributes.action: remove food eaten in their second homes and in the various restaurants around the Palace of Westminster from the list of items which politicians may claim against their tax-free allowances and subsidies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is immoral for taxpayers of this land to pay for food eaten by politicians and their guests at the second homes which politicians 'are required' to maintain at taxpayers expense and at the many subsidised bars and restaurants dotted around the Palace of Westminster while those same taxpayers are suffering increased food prices as a direct result of mismanagement of the EU Agricultural Policies by those same politicians.
